Name: maximize_completed_story_points
Description: Maximize the sum of story points from all user stories with the status 'done' across all sprints.

Name: minimize_project_costs
Description: Minimize the total budget consumed by the project, representing the overall cost.

Name: maximize_feature_priority_value
Description: Maximize the value delivered by focusing on features with the highest priority ratings.

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Minimize the negative impact of impediments by reducing the cumulative severity of all active blockers.

Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize the average amount of work (story points) a team can get done in a sprint.

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize the number of sprints that successfully achieve their defined sprint goal.

Name: minimize_task_effort
Description: Minimize the total effort (e.g., in hours) required to complete all tasks within a sprint or release.

Name: maximize_stakeholder_satisfaction
Description: Maximize the satisfaction of key stakeholders by prioritizing work relevant to those with high influence.

Name: minimize_time_to_resolve_blockers
Description: Minimize the duration between when a blocker is detected and when it is resolved.

Name: maximize_team_satisfaction
Description: Maximize the overall team morale and satisfaction as reported in sprint retrospectives.

Name: minimize_effort_for_high_priority_stories
Description: Prioritize efficiency by minimizing the effort spent on user stories that have the highest priority.

Name: maximize_skill_coverage_on_team
Description: Maximize the variety and depth of skills available within a team to improve cross-functionality.
